data.trans: Không nhận thức được về thời gian
data.trans_hint: Tôi chìm đắm trong việc đọc sách tới mức quên hết cả thời gian.
data.en_hint: I was so engrossed in the book that I lost track of time.
data.content_game_1: I was so engrossed in the book that I lost track of time.
data.answer_en_hint: I was so engrossed in the book that I lost track of time.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy tới đúng giờ cho buổi phỏng vấn.
data.en_hint: He arrived on time for the interview.
data.content_game_1: He arrived on time for the interview.
data.answer_en_hint: He arrived on time for the interview.

data.trans_hint: Công cụ hữu ích này sẽ tiết kiệm thời gian cho bạn.
data.en_hint: This effective tool will save time for you.
data.content_game_1: This effective tool will save time for you.
data.answer_en_hint: This effective tool will save time for you.

data.trans_hint: Tôi thích dành thời gian chơi với em trai của mình.
data.en_hint: I love spending time playing with my little brother.
data.content_game_1: I love spending time playing with my little brother.
data.answer_en_hint: I love spending time playing with my little brother.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy trang điểm lâu tới nỗi lỡ luôn chuyến xe khách.
data.en_hint: She took so long to make up that she missed the bus.
data.content_game_1: She took so long to make up that she missed the bus.
data.answer_en_hint: She took so long to make up that she missed the bus.

data.trans_hint: Nhiều điều tốt đẹp sẽ xảy ra vào đúng thời điểm.
data.en_hint: A lot of good things will happen at the right time.
data.content_game_1: A lot of good things will happen at the right time.
data.answer_en_hint: A lot of good things will happen at the right time.

data.trans_hint: Những cuốn sách này được sắp xếp theo trình tự thời gian.
data.content_game_1: The books are chronologically arranged.
data.answer_en_hint: The books are chronologically arranged.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy trước kia từng là chủ tịch của một câu lạc bộ.
data.en_hint: He formerly served as the president of the club.
data.content_game_1: He formerly served as the president of the club.
data.answer_en_hint: He formerly served as the president of the club.

data.trans_hint: Khoa học đã thành công trong việc chữa trị những căn bệnh mà trước đó không chữa được.
data.en_hint: Science succeeds in treating previously incurable disease.
data.content_game_1: Science succeeds in treating previously incurable disease.
data.answer_en_hint: Science succeeds in treating previously incurable disease.

data.trans_hint: Chất phụ gia thực phẩm được thêm vào sau đó.
data.content_game_1: Food additives are added subsequently.
data.answer_en_hint: Food additives are added subsequently.
